knimeNode.name: spaCy POS Tagger
knimeNode.shortDescription: The node assigns part of speech to each token of the document.

fullDescription.intro: The node assigns part of speech to each token of the document. Generalized spaCy POS tag set is used. Different spaCy models might have different tag sets. POS or UDPOS tag sets are used.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: Select a Document column that will be affected by POS tagging.

tab.name: Model
tab.option: Pick one of the official spaCy models, or refer to a custom model stored in the filesystem. In the latter case refer to a folder with meta.json and config files.

ports.inPort: The input table which contains the documents to preprocess.
ports.outPort: The output table which contains the preprocessed documents.
